text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-Institution
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-PrivateResidence
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-Homeless
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-LivingArrangement

name: LivingArrangement
title: LivingArrangement
description: A code depicting the living arrangements of a person
